name: ms. paintman
description:
a short game made for ms paint jam. all textured made in an ms paint clone (https://jspaint.app). fun! to! make! 

and sorry about the z-fighting in that bit

and sorry if the text is too small (use a lower resolution)

and sorry that it doesn't quit in the web gl one after the dialogue on the hill like it is supposed to.

enjoy?
